transcripts.text: Media mogul Sumner Redstone died yesterday.  The industry giant was 97 years old.  He built Viacom, CBS, and Paramount Pictures.  I've had many interviews with him over the years, and he always would tell me that he drank this certain wine, enabling him to stay alive forever.  He always talked about how he was going to stay alive forever because he drank this wine.  He made it to 97 years old.  Sumner Redstone.  What do you think that wine is?  Hashtag save our children.  Hashtag save the children.  Many interviews with him over the years and he always would tell me that he drank this certain wine.  This keeps getting deleted, so please make sure you share everywhere.  He always talked about how he was going to stay alive forever because he drank this wine.  He made it to 97 years old.
